text: Ogre Battle 64 is an excellent game! If you like Final Fantasy Tactics, TacticsOgre, the original Ogre Battle, Fire Emblem, Disciples, or even Shining Force or Vandal Hearts, you will enjoy this game. It is one of the best games on the 64.

text: Cartridges got something special that CDs don't have. I can't really describe it, but it's something with the fact that they were only for games, CDs goes for music and a lot of other things.
